analysis.key_quote: I oppose any reclassification of our federal workforce. The Office of Personnel Management's new proposal... will make it so our nonpartisan federal workers can be fired for political reasons.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the reclassification of federal workers and raises concerns about politicization, loss of institutional knowledge, and the potential for political interference in hiring practices, which aligns with the indicators of opposition to the proposed rule.
